On the fundraising night, Torbjoern Larisch, our CEO, presented our donation of 1,000,000 THB (One Million Baht!) to the Diamond Elephant Foundation. By giving back in this way, we are delighted to help 200 ethnic children, cared for by the foundation's shelter, to have better living conditions, quality education and a brighter future.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: Donated one million baht to the Diamond Elephant Foundation

seo.title: Donated one million baht to the Diamond Elephant Foundation - FLS
seo.metaDesc: We are delighted to help 200 ethnic children to have better living conditions, quality education and a brighter future.
seo.opengraphTitle: Donated one million baht to the Diamond Elephant Foundation - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: We are delighted to help 200 ethnic children to have better living conditions, quality education and a brighter future.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Our responsibility toward society grows as we expand our business. Driving for positive impact, we recently held a charity golf challenge with our chairman, Mr. Martin Haeberli, our CEO, CFO and Projects Director.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: On the fundraising night, Torbjoern Larisch, our CEO, presented our donation of 1,000,000 THB (One Million Baht!) to the Diamond Elephant Foundation. By giving back in this way, we are delighted to help 200 ethnic children, cared for by the foundation's shelter, to have better living conditions, quality education and a brighter future.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Together with love and compassion, in our own small way, we are helping move the world to be a better place. Join us in making some valuable changes at www.diamondelephant.org
